main event: On 5 July 1956, a circular object was sighted in Euclid, Ohio, appearing to be revolving and emitting a bluish-green light.
interesting points: The sighting included ground visual and radar observation., The object was at an altitude of 3 to 6 thousand feet., The object was reported to be drifting northeast., The length of observation was noted but not specified., Conclusions drawn included the possibilities of it being a balloon or an aircraft.
sighted object: one circular object emitting bluish-green light
